description: Sequence and first differences (A061578) include all numbers.
comments: The lexicographically earliest sequence that begins with 2 and together with its first differences (A030124) contain every positive integer exactly once.
links: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
author: Ronald van Eijck (eequalsmcsquare(AT)hotmail.com), May 21 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 12 2001
